document.title: Gardening audience learns about fungi that benefit trees
document.abstract: This image of a mushroom was used to teach gardeners that not all fungi are harmful. This red mushroom (Russula sp.) is a mycorrhizal (mycor=fungus, rhizal=root) fungus that helps trees absorb nutrients and water that would not otherwise be available.
document.publication-title: University of Tennessee Institute of Agriculture Photo Competition 2014-2015
